channel.title: You can now buy dungeoneering rewards!
channel.description:
[img]http://puu.sh/aN4PR/feab8f8aa2.jpg[/img] Would you look at that. You can now spin to win dungeoneering tokens. Which can be used to buy dungeoneering items, or better yet, exp. Yes they had the lamps and such already, but now this is just even more xp to buy. Good job Jagex.
Sidenote: them 7 days till 10 year.

item.title: You can now buy dungeoneering rewards!
item.dc:creator: @Stunninhigh Stunninhigh
item.description:
@Stunninhigh wrote:

[quote=“HcoJustin, post:4, topic:545831”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=664714.msg4443490#msg4443490 date=1407713366]

this is kind of old

I didn’t see anything about dungeoneering tokens. I’ve never seen those on the wheel ever.
I’ve seen lamps and the things like lamps. But yea.
[/quote]
They’ve been on there for a longgggggggggg time. Many many many months[/quote]

Read full topic
item.source: You can now buy dungeoneering rewards!

you can get those d&d tokens to do sinkholes multiple times a day as well
